column5: Off I went to Radioworld to pick up the X67 ice model at the regions best price of $330.  Only...they sold out this week.  (more due in mid Jan.)  Dejectedly I stopped at Le Baron's on the way home to see if they would come close to matching Radioworld's price.  I am a member after all.  I checked out the display and the listed sale price was $317.94.  Sold!  No more fishing in the dark.  Cheers, Mark
$317.94 was that before or after your 10% members discount?
according to their online catalog, it is 317.94 but it is a "select special"... so i'm not sure if the 10% member discount will apply...
As it is already discounted, member discount is not applied.   I tried anyways at the cash...rebuffed with extreme prejudice.  Cheers,  Mark
